original_text: And all the army of the Chaldeans, who were with the captain of the guard, broke down the walls around Jerusalem.
korean_text: 시위대장에게 속한 갈대아 온 군대가 예루살렘 주위의 성벽을 헐었으며

sentences.original_text: And all the army of the Chaldeans
who were with the captain of the guard
broke down the walls around Jerusalem
